message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of grounding distributional representations of texts on the visual domain, which is a common topic in both computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also proposes a technique for augmenting image captioning datasets using linguistic rules and WordNet knowledge base, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the limitations of current frameworks and datasets, which is a common theme in machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
